description: Manage VM extension metadata available for Azure Arc-Enabled Servers.

commands.name: az connectedmachine extension image list
commands.summary: List all Extension versions based on location, publisher, extensionType.
examples: az connectedmachine extension image list --publisher microsoft.azure.monitor --extension-type azuremonitorlinuxagent --location eastus

commands.name: az connectedmachine extension image show
commands.summary: Get an Extension Metadata based on location, publisher, extensionType and version.
examples: az connectedmachine extension image show --publisher microsoft.azure.monitor --extension-type azuremonitorlinuxagent --location eastus --version 1.9.1
